title: LF Team Coach/Analyst
body:
Hey guys I am zG Hi im Billie

 I am currently in search for a D+ solo q ranked coach and analyst to join my D+ ranked team. The team is currently in P3 in ranked 5's q and they are working towards achieving challenger in ranked 5's. We are a serious team aiming to get to the OOL and eventually OPL. We will be entering a lot of tournaments and doing a lot of practise and scrims to further the team. At this point in time we cannot pay, but in future when we get bigger and start earning some money we can work something out.

Add me in game if you are interested and we can talk more

Cheers

replies.body: heya.. im currently g3 and on the rise.. ive been looking for a team thats serious.. and while i dont expect to join your team i was wondering if u got any tip or if i could game with u when u not with ur team to see a plat or diamond game so that i can get better??/
